scripts.build: cd ./client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.clean: cd ./client && npm run clean && cd ../server && npm run clean && cd ../shared && npm run clean && cd ../
scripts.clean:all: cd ./client && npm run clean:all && cd ../server && npm run clean:all && cd ../shared && npm run clean:all && cd../ && rimraf ./node_modules
scripts.debug: concurrently "cd ./client && npm run build:watch" "cd ./server && npm run debug"
scripts.lint: cd ./client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint && cd ../
scripts.postinstall: cd ./shared && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd ./client && npm run build:env && cd ../server && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.start: concurrently "cd ./client && npm run build:watch" "cd ./server && npm run start"
scripts.test: npm run lint && cd ./client && npm run test && cd ../server && npm run test && cd ../
